statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x , -x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 1 , 4 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 2 , x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + x - 2 , -6 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
